enum.3: Optimized Mode /w BatteryLife: self consumption, SoC exceeds 85%
enum.4: Optimized Mode /w BatteryLife: self consumption, SoC at 100%
enum.5: Optimized Mode /w BatteryLife: SoC below dynamic SoC limit
enum.6: Optimized Mode /w BatteryLife: SoC has been below SoC limit for more than 24 hours. Charging the battery (5A)
enum.7: Optimized Mode /w BatteryLife: Inverter/Charger is in sustain mode
enum.8: Optimized Mode /w BatteryLife: recharging, SoC dropped by 5% or more below the minimum SoC
enum.10: Optimized mode w/o BatteryLife: self consumption, SoC at or above minimum SoC
enum.11: Optimized mode w/o BatteryLife: self consumption, SoC is below minimum SoC
enum.12: Optimized mode w/o BatteryLife: recharging, SoC dropped by 5% or more below minimum SoC
